scripts.style-check: status=0; for command in 'prettier --check **/*.{css,html,js,json,md,mjs,ts,yml}' eslint 'htmlhint --config .htmlhintrc.json' 'stylelint **/*.css'; do eval $command || status=1; done; exit $status
scripts.style-fix: status=0; for command in 'prettier --write **/*.{css,html,js,json,md,mjs,ts,yml}' 'eslint --fix' 'stylelint --fix **/*.css'; do eval $command || status=1; done; exit $status
